header.gameNote: PARADISE JAM AT ST THOMAS VIRGIN ISLANDS

article.description:
Stanly Burrell
scored 26 points to lead Xavier to a 71-66 victory over Villanova
in the U.S. Virgin Islands Paradise Jam on Sunday.
article.headline: Burrell, Xavier stave off game effort from Sumpter, Nova
article.linkText: Burrell, Xavier stave off game effort from Villanova
article.story: CHARLOTTE AMALIE, U.S. Virgin Islands (AP) -- Stanley Burrell scored 26 points to lead Xavier to a 71-66 victory over Villanova in the U.S. Virgin Islands Paradise Jam on Sunday. Justin Doellman added nine points and eight rebounds to help Xavier (3-0) get the win in a game that had 13 lead changes and eight ties. Curtis Sumpter and Shane Clark had 17 points apiece for Villanova (2-1). Down 66-68 with 15 seconds left, Sumpter's 15-foot jumper was tipped and Dante Cunningham was fouled grabbing one of his eight rebounds. Cunningham made one of two foul shots. Villanova's Mike Nardi then missed a 3-pointer and fouled Burrell, who made both foul shots to put the game out of reach with .9 seconds left.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
